domain.name: Domain
domain.desc: The root location of the Firebase data.

onıtemlistchanged11.description: Triggered when any item changed, included item added, removed, value changed.

foreachıtemıd12.description: Repeat the event for each itemID of load result which sorted by itemID.

foreachkey13.description: Repeat the event for each key of a item of load result.

setdomainref0.display-text: Set domain to [i]{0}[/i], sub domain to [i]{1}[/i]

domain0.name: Domain
domain0.desc: The root location of the Firebase data.

lastıtemıd1.description: Get last itemID, used under "condition: On item added" or "condition: On item removed".

lastıtemcontent2.description: Get last content in JSON string, used under "condition: On item added" or "condition: On item removed". Add 2nd parameter for specific key, 3rd parameter for default value if this key is not existed.

at3.description: Get value by itemId and key in last load result. Add 3rd parameter for default value if this key is not existed.

lastıtemcontentposx4.description: Get X position in last content in JSON string, used under "condition: On item added" or "condition: On item removed".

lastıtemcontentposy5.description: Get Y position in last content in JSON string, used under "condition: On item added" or "condition: On item removed".

lastpropertyname11.description: Get last content in JSON string, used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

lastvalue12.description: Get last value of key, used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

prevvalue13.description: Get previous value of key, used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

lastvalueposx14.description: Get last X position in key "pos", used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

lastvalueposy15.description: Get last Y position in key "pos", used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

prevvalueposx16.description: Get previous X position in key "pos", used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

prevvalueposy17.description: Get previous Y position in key "pos", used under "condition: On any value changed", "condition: On key added" or "condition: On key removed".

curıtemıd21.description: Get current itemID in a For Each loop, in last load result. Or in save/remove callback.

curıtemcontent22.description: Get last content in JSON string, used under "condition: On item added" or "condition: On item removed". Add 2nd parameter for specific key, 3rd parameter for default value if this key is not existed.

curkey23.description: Get current key in a For Each loop, in last load result.

curvalue24.description: Get current value in a For Each loop, in last load result.
